title: Schedule a Receiving Appointment
description: A supplier needs to schedule a delivery appointment for a large shipment arriving next week.

tasks.description: Access the warehouse's receiving dock calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent opens the scheduling tool for the receiving department.

tasks.description: Find an available time slot for the specified date and shipment size.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies an open 2-hour slot on the requested day.

tasks.description: Book the appointment and send a confirmation to the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the appointment and a confirmation email is sent.
